attributes.action: Scrap this stupid e-petition scheme as it will NEVER actually achieve anything (apart from giving false hope that people can make a difference).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This e-petition scheme is just as pointless as the "text or email your comments" section of BBC's QuestionTime where your texts and emails simply vanish into the cyber-trash.

It's all designed to appease people and make them think they can really make a difference when they can make absolutely NO difference whatsoever.

rejection.details: Comments on the petition system should be sent to: weboligarch@pmo.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
